repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:2.3.1

RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENV APP_HOME /app
RUN mkdir $APP_HOME
WORKDIR $APP_HOME

ADD Gemfile* $APP_HOME/

ENV BUNDLE_GEMFILE=$APP_HOME/Gemfile \
    BUNDLE_JOBS=2 \
    BUNDLE_PATH=/bundle

RUN bundle install --retry 3

ADD . $APP_HOME
